main event: A round, white object the size of a basketball with a long tail was observed moving slowly northwest and fading out of sight in Devils River, Texas.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 1 hour.
It was moving slowly northwest and faded out of sight in short fog.
The observation was made by a civilian witness using binoculars.
The report concludes that the object was undoubtedly a balloon.
There was no unusual sighting picked up on radar.
sighted object: round, white object the size of a basketball with a long tail
photographs: No, the report does not contain any photographs.
